title: Put your best face forward with this video conferencing app
content: You can do more with your web presentations than be a face in the corner of a slideshow. XSplit Presenter Premium: Lifetime Subscription (Windows) lets you create fun, engaging presentations for video conferences and meetings, and it’s on sale for $59 (Reg. $200).  XSplit Presenter gives you the tools you need for high-quality, professional presentations, whether you […]
